text: Beaufort County is a county in the U.S. state of North Carolina. In 2020, 44,652 people lived there. Its county seat is Washington. == Government == Beaufort County is part of the Mid-East Commission. == Connected counties == These counties are connected to Beaufort County: *Washington County (northeast) *Hyde County (east) *Pamlico County (southeast) *Craven County (southwest) *Pitt County (west) *Martin County (northwest) == Cities and towns == These cities and towns are in Beaufort County: *Aurora *Bath *Belhaven *Chocowinity *Pantego *River Road *Washington *Washington Park == References == Category:North Carolina counties Category:1730s establishments in North Carolina Category:1739 establishments
title: Beaufort County, North Carolina
